segments.text: I see the girl reaching up, her hand open like she’s begging for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so excited, like she doesn’t even notice the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her brother is balancing on that stool, and she’s just standing there, waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s too young to realize how bad this could end.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way she’s looking at him, like he’s her hero for getting those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice her posture, so eager and full of trust.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t even seem to care that the floor is wet and slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll cry if he falls and drops all the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way she’s standing there, like she’s part of some secret mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see her arm raised, like she’s ready to catch whatever he gives her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she doesn’t get hurt when that stool finally tips over.
segments.speaker: PAR
